group_1.textLeft: Thank you! Please come again!
Whew, it sure is packed for this time of day, huh?

group_1.textRight: The crowd'll die down in a bit, @so you won't have to pitch in anymore.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, in that case...
I'll whip something up for you for dinner @while I'm at it!

group_1.textRight: No, that's alright.@I can handle that much myself.

group_1.textLeft: But that's just the regular staff meal, @isn't it?
I know you've only been eating the same kind of @Chinese food every day!
I wanna make sure you're getting a balanced diet, @so leave it to me!

group_1.textRight: Once you set your mind to somethin', @there's no changin' it...
...Guess I'll have to let you spoil me a bit.

group_1.textLeft: Order up!
The Tsuruno Special is ready! @Deluxe chilled Chinese noodles!

group_1.textRight: [chara:800900:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]You ended up makin' Chinese food anyway...?!

group_1.textLeft: It's packed full of nutritious veggies, so it's fine!
I'll stick it in the fridge so you can grab a bite @when work settles down, okay?
Alright! @Next stop: homework!

group_1.textRight: That reminds me, aren't you goin' to Yachiyo's @house tonight...?

group_1.textLeft: Yep, which is why I'm gonna hammer out my @homework before I head over!
I wanna help Felicia with her own homework @when I get there!

group_1.textRight: ...I say this all the time, but you're not gonna @get punished if you take things a little slower.

group_1.textLeft: I know; it's just that I feel like I should do @what I can while I'm able...
I've still got some gas left in the tank, @so I'll be totally fine!
Oh?
Wait, Master?!

group_1.textRight: I was out shopping for dinner nearby, and figured @I'd come pick you up.

group_1.textLeft: That's my kindhearted Master for ya!

group_1.textRight: ...I just wanted to make sure that you weren't @running off the rails again today.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean, "again today"?

group_1.textRight: Hahaha, see? @Yachiyo knows what I'm talking about.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wha... Dad, you're ganging up on me?!
But I haven't done my homework yet...

group_1.textRight: I'll look after that for you today.

group_1.textLeft: Are you sure? @I know you're busy, too...

group_1.textRight: Sometimes you've got to let others take some of @the weight off your shoulders.

group_1.textLeft: OH!! @That's right!

group_1.textRight: Come on... Don't shout like that. You startled me...

group_1.textLeft: Sorry...
But still, you just reminded me that I made @an important promise!

group_1.textCenter: that I'm always working too hard on my own, @and they're concerned about me...
Even if I think I can handle it,
it's no good if I'm pushing myself in a way that @makes other people worry, you know?
So I said, "I'll remember to unwind and take @time for myself every now and then!"
That was my promise to both of them, @and I almost broke it...
I'm still a rookie at this,
but since I don't want either of them to worry @while they're so far away,
I'm gonna make sure to keep my word!
So rest easy, you two... @I hope you'll always be watching over me.
